name: Elemental Dog Shelter
description:
My entry for the Weekly game Jam 152 - Theme: Shelter

You work in an intergalactic dog shelter that looks after one breed of dog.

Elemental Dogs: dogs that change form depending on their temperature.

Didn't quite get all the visuals done yet but may add them in future. There is no sounds currently either. This was a one person creation over a week.
